articles.title: RB Leipzig 'slap £100MILLION price tag on Christopher Nkunku to ward off interest from Man United' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nkunku is one of the hottest properties in Europe after scoring 35 goals in all competitions last season and has been linked to Man United, Arsenal, Liverpool and Paris Saint-Germain.

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate and captain Harry Kane have hit out at the possibility of a World Cup WAGs documentary. The wives and girlfriends of players have reportedly been approached.
